thread.title: Natalie McElroy-Synowiec
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Natalie McElroy-Synowiec

author: Natalie McElroy-Synowiec
title: Natalie McElroy-Synowiec
text: A really super efficient service, however the size guide was inaccurate and therefore I had to return my item. I think the Spanish / European sizes were mixed up as a 38 in European is 10 and 12 in Spain. I wanted the size 10 and ordered the 38 but it was huge.
